BibleStudyGui::BackgroundWorker

BibleStudyGui::BackgroundWorker Class Reference

This class executes a given command on a background thread. Call QThread::start() to start the worker. More...

Detailed Description

This class executes a given command on a background thread. Call QThread::start() to start the worker.
